name: Mary the Innkeeper
long_description: Mary is the warm and welcoming innkeeper of this establishment. Her kind eyes and genuine smile make travelers feel at home. She wears a simple but clean apron over her dress and always seems to know exactly what a weary traveler needs.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to our inn! Would you like a room for the night?
dialogue.default: We have the most comfortable beds in town, and my stew is famous throughout the region!
dialogue.goodbye: Safe travels, and come back anytime!
